channel.title: The 10-Min Book Club
channel.description: In just 10 minutes, absorb the most important insights from the world's most popular and highest-rated books. Master key concepts that took authors years to develop – condensed into bite-sized episodes that transform how you think, work, and live.
channel.itunes:author: Reggie Yang
channel.itunes:summary: In just 10 minutes, absorb the most important insights from the world's most popular and highest-rated books. Master key concepts that took authors years to develop – condensed into bite-sized episodes that transform how you think, work, and live.

item.title: Book 1: The Untethered Soul – The Journey Beyond Yourself
item.description: Exploring Michael Singer's transformative guide to spiritual awakening and inner freedom. We discuss how to break free from habitual thoughts, embrace consciousness, and find peace beyond the constant chatter of the mind.
item.itunes:summary: Exploring Michael Singer's transformative guide to spiritual awakening and breaking free from habitual thoughts.

item.title: Book 2: Extreme Ownership – How Navy SEALs Lead and Win
item.description: Diving into Jocko Willink and Leif Babin's powerful leadership principles forged in combat. We explore how taking complete responsibility for everything in your world leads to better outcomes in business, teams, and life.
item.itunes:summary: Diving into Jocko Willink and Leif Babin's powerful leadership principles about taking complete responsibility.

item.title: Book 3: The Psychology of Money – Timeless Lessons on Wealth, Greed, and Happiness
item.description: Unpacking Morgan Housel's insights into how psychology, emotions, and behavior drive financial decisions. We discuss why being reasonable beats being rational, the power of compounding, and how to build lasting wealth through better money habits.
item.itunes:summary: Unpacking Morgan Housel's insights into how psychology and behavior drive financial decisions.

item.title: Book 4: Simply Said – Communicating Better at Work and Beyond
item.description: Exploring Jay Sullivan's practical guide to clear, confident communication in professional and personal settings. We cover how to structure your thoughts, engage your audience, and deliver messages that resonate and inspire action.
item.itunes:summary: Exploring Jay Sullivan's practical guide to clear, confident communication in professional settings.

item.title: Book 5: Zero to One: Notes on Startups, or How to Build the Future
item.description: Diving into Peter Thiel's contrarian insights on innovation and building monopolistic businesses. We explore how to go from zero to one by creating something entirely new, the importance of secrets, and why competition can be destructive for businesses.
item.itunes:summary: Diving into Peter Thiel's contrarian insights on innovation and building monopolistic businesses.
